page.title: 16A TEENAGER'S DAY
page.content: On a school morning, I get up at about 8 am though at weekends it varies between 9 and 11, depending how tired I am. I have a large breakfast of cornflakes and rice crispies then turn the telly on. At weekends, I get my bike out of the shed and go and practise BMX stunts. Sometimes I play with my puppy or kick the cat! I have lunch about 1 pm and then if there's nothing on TV, I will watch a video. I have to do odd jobs in the house and one daily job is to tidy and hoover the living room. In the evening I mess about with my mates on bikes or play football and walk my puppy. One favourite hobby is annoying my brother Shane. I usually go to bed between 9 and 11 depending whether there is anything good to watch on telly.
